code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import Logo from'./Logo';import'./Navigation.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navigation=()=>{const location=useLocation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navigation",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Logo,{className:"nav-logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-divider"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-brand",children:"Size Guide"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:`nav-link ${location.pathname==='/'?'active':''}`,children:"Size Converter"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/profile-builder",className:`nav-link ${location.pathname==='/profile-builder'?'active':''}`,children:"Profile Builder"})]})]});};export default Navigation;
